Class OrderRepository

java.lang.Object
org.truta193.whmanager.pt2024_30221_truta_andrei_assignment_3.dataaccess.repository.OrderRepository
public class OrderRepository extends Object
Repository for handling CRUD operations related to Order entities in the database.

    • insert

      public Order insert(Order order)
      Inserts a new order into the repository and returns the inserted order. Decreases the quantity of the product by the quantity of the order.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to insert.
      Returns:
      The inserted order.

      public Order getById(int id)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
